Why is that so hard?

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553d94d063687226ea150600#post_553d94d063687226ea150600
Tite Kubo, why you do this?!

You could have made that a different way of Ichigo getting his powers back. Maybe another sector of the universe that nobody knew. Or maybe Ichigo forced to come back when Soul Society is threatened by an inside or outside enemy. Hell, implementing Ichigo to get his powers during the Quincy Invasion Arc would make better sense!
